oa:hasBody.rdf:value: This is a very interesting comment about the table; it's a table!

columns.name: GID
columns.dc:description: An identifier for the operation on a tree.

columns.name: on_street
columns.dc:description: The street that the tree is on.

columns.name: trim_cycle
columns.dc:description: The operation performed on the tree.

columns.name: dbh
columns.dc:description: Diameter at Breast Height (DBH) of the tree (in feet), measured 4.5ft above ground.

columns.name: inventory_date
columns.dc:description: The date of the operation that was performed.

columns.name: comments
columns.dc:description: Supplementary comments relating to the operation or tree.

columns.name: protected
columns.dc:description: Indication (YES / NO) whether the tree is subject to a protection order.
